text: @realDonaldTrump Australia records first coronavirus death as authorities review travel advice. After the US & they didn't slam doors shut. Yes, Australia betters the US and they are IN Asia!! They aren't declaring political HEROES like Trump!! He still has tariffs on medicines made in China.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
